name: Data Chip (Encrypted)
attributes: Contains lore or mission data; requires 'Decrypt' skill.

name: Optical Internal HUD
attributes: Displays room exits and player health in real-time.

name: Signal Jammer
attributes: Prevents 'Call for Backup' in the current room.

name: External Hard Drive
attributes: Used to extract 'Data Payloads' from servers.

name: Exoskeleton Frame
description: A hydraulic frame that boosts strength.

name: Painkillers
description: A bottle of pain relief pills.

name: Neon Spray-Paint
description: A can of glowing spray paint.
